# This file is autogenerated
title: setPhoneNumber
description: Overview of the setPhoneNumber method
slug: wallets/reference/account-kit/signer/classes/BaseAlchemySigner/setPhoneNumber
---

Sets the phone number for the authenticated user, allowing them to login with that
phone number. `sendVerificationCode` should be called first to obtain the code.

## Import

```ts
import { BaseAlchemySigner } from "@account-kit/signer";
```

## Parameters

### params

`VerificationParams`
An object containing the verification code

### params.verificationCode

`string`
The OTP verification code

## Returns

`Promise<void>`
A promise that resolves when the phone number is set
